**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 94 1.1, [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 77 **Price** 700 gp **Usage** affixed to a weapon **Activate**envision **Trigger** You damage a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creature with the affixed weapon. --- This bone statuette of a sneering gremlin crumbles to dust when activated, imparting a fraction of its subject's infamous misfortune on those you strike. The damaged creature must attempt a DC 33 Will save. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature must roll twice and take the worse result on the next check it attempts.
**Failure** The creature must roll twice and take the worse result on all checks until the end of its next turn.
name: Grinning Pugwampi
